arguments.question: Please provide the full text of the clause.

messages.content:
## Policy ID: LSIAG-01
**Section 4.3 – Remote Work Data Security**

All employees must encrypt all confidential data stored on personal devices used for remote work. Encryption must use AES‑256 or an equivalent standard approved by the Information Security Office. The encrypted data must be stored on devices that are managed via the corporate Mobile Device Management (MDM) platform. Failure to comply with this requirement will result in disciplinary action up to and including termination.

*Effective Date: 2023‑01‑01*
*Last Reviewed: 2024‑06‑15*
